alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tippah; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:29PM CDT until June 11 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Theo, or 11 miles southwest of Corinth, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Booneville, Tishomingo State Park, Jumpertown, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Theo, Rienzi, Marietta, Kossuth, Paden, Allentown, Hightown, Thrasher, Moores Mill, Collinstown, Biggersville, Crumtown and Gaston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
